jp_text: レバーを左に回すんだよ｡
google_translated: I turn the lever to the left.

jp_text: レバーって どっちの？

en_text: Hmm? There should be only one.
jp_text: うん？１個しかないだろ｡
あれ 本当だ ２つある…｡
google_translated: There are two things that are true ....

en_text: We'll try again in twenty minutes. i screwed up again.
jp_text: ⦅あ～ またやっちまった⦆
生きてる時に見るもんだ⦆

en_text: Their heart rates spiked right before we lost contact.
jp_text: 心拍数が急上昇してる｡

en_text: Somewhere so deep that we can't receive transmissions?
jp_text: 届かないほど 深い場所に…》
google_translated: In a deep place that does not reach ...

en_text: I should know that... just calm down.
jp_text: わかってるけど…くそ 落ち着け！
google_translated: I know, but ... 落 落 落 落!!

jp_text: 《なんで横に…》

en_text: We need to look for them.
jp_text: 探しに行きましょう！
⦅その時が来るまで⦆

en_text: First, it'll take an hour to prep Beetle.
jp_text: まず ビートルの準備に６０分｡➡
google_translated: First of all, 60 minutes to prepare for Beetles.

jp_text: またあとで来るよ ギブソン｡
google_translated: It will come again after Gibson.

jp_text: 《待ってろ ダミアン！》
《よし！バギーもある》
見えるか？ダミアン｡
体が凍りそうに寒い｡➡
google_translated: The body is cold and cold.

jp_text: 俺を置いていってくれ…｡
そうだ ヒビト…それでいい…｡
泣くんだろうな アラン…｡
いや あれはいいんだよ｡

en_text: He said that Brian is still on the moon.
jp_text: 今もまだ月にいるんだってさ｡➡
google_translated: I'm still in the moon now.

en_text: But I don't want that to happen...
jp_text: でも…そうなったら やだなあ｡
google_translated: But ... I'm sorry if it happens.

jp_text: 《何やってんだ？ヒビト…》

en_text: Micrometeorites and space debris don't make it down this far.
jp_text: 《微小隕石も宇宙ゴミも➡

en_text: It's just an unmanned probe, but it's big and powerful.
jp_text: 結構デカイし パワーもある｡➡
google_translated: There is quite a big deal and power.

en_text: It should be able to carry you.
jp_text: ダミアン１人ぐらいなら運べるよ｡
google_translated: You can carry it for one dumian.

en_text: But we only abandon our buddies,
jp_text: ただし 仲間を捨ててもいいのは➡
google_translated: However, it is okay to throw away the fellow

jp_text: ﾎﾞｲｽﾗｲﾀｰ さあ 行こう｡

en_text: That'll tell us how deep it is.
jp_text: そうすれば 谷の深さがわかる｡
google_translated: Then you can see the depth of the valley.

en_text: JAXA will offer whatever assistance it can.
jp_text: 我々JAXAも できることをやろう｡
google_translated: Let's do what we can do with JAXA.

en_text: Hibito, let me see your back.
jp_text: ＜ヒ…ヒビト…背中を見せろ｡➡
